fullForm: Council of Scientific and Industrial Research National Eligibility Test
examType: Eligibility Test for Junior Research Fellowship (JRF) and Lectureship/Assistant Professor
eligibility: MSc or equivalent degree/Integrated BS-MS/BS-4 years/BE/BTech/BPharma/MBBS with at least 55% marks for General/OBC and 50% for SC/ST/Third gender/PwD candidates. Candidates enrolled for MSc or having completed 10+2+3 years are also eligible under the Result Awaited (RA) category, subject to completing the qualifying degree with required percentage within two years.
subjectsTested: Earth, Atmospheric, Ocean and Planetary Sciences

faqs.question: What is the purpose of the CSIR NET exam?
faqs.answer: The CSIR NET exam determines eligibility for Junior Research Fellowship (JRF) and for Lectureship/Assistant Professor positions in Indian universities and colleges.
